name: amiga-blitzbasic2
description: Language Support for Amiga Blitz Basic 2 and Amiblitz

AmigaBlitzBasic2.blitzType.description: Which Blitz do you use, AmiBlitz 3.x or Blitz Basic 2?

AmigaBlitzBasic2.sharedFolder.description: Virtual harddrive volume name in UAE (if the `:` is not present, it will be automatically added). It is the sharing point of your code between VSCode and UAE. The shared harddrive path configured in WinUAE or FS-UAE should match your workspace path.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.SetCompilerOptions.description: Set compiler options, as part of the compile process, for the main source file. This only concerns Blitz Basic 2 source files, Amiblitz store compiler options directly in the source file(s). You can specify the compiler options in the settings group named 'Compiler Options'.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.UAECommandLine.description: The full command line for launching UAE, including configuration file and other parameters.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.UAELaunchDelay.description: Number of seconds to wait for Amiga OS to launch in UAE.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.UAEPort.description: UAE serial direct connection port for AUX: mount.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.IPAddress.description: IP address of your Amiga. It is recommended that you give your Amiga a static IP address (router DHCP settings).

AmigaBlitzBasic2.FTPUser.description: Username for the FTP server on your Amiga.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.FTPPassword.description: Password for the FTP server on your Amiga. IMPORTANT!: Use a password you don't use anywhere else, since the password is stored as normal text.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.Assign.description: The volume name (assign) for your projects folder on your Amiga (if the `:` is not present, it will be automatically added)

AmigaBlitzBasic2.MakeSmallestCode.description: Enable the option to make the smallest code

AmigaBlitzBasic2.CreateDebugInfo.description: Create debug info for executable files

AmigaBlitzBasic2.ISOCD.description: Filepath for the ISOCD from the cd32 developer kit.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.CDTVTM.description: Filepath for the CDTV.TM from the cdtv or cd32 developer kit.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.CD32TM.description: Filepath for the CD32.TM from the cd32 developer kit.

AmigaBlitzBasic2.RMTM.description: Filepath for the RMTM from the cdtv or cd32 developer kit.
